long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights and colors grades in the scoresheet view of the PowerSchool web app. A 90% and up, B 80% and up, C 70% and up, D 65% and up, F below 65%. When you install this extension, it will ask to read and change your data. This happens locally in your browser and does not have the ability to transmit or share anything. Code for this extension is available at the support URL for download or study.  Future updates coming.
